name: Creature Café
description:
You are a chef at a restaurant but your strange and mysterious customers are too stressed to order!
Well you know just what to do… Use your cooking skills and special ingredients to cook some dishes that will cheer them up!

Listen to their complaints and feed them enough of the right foods to lower their stress and solve their problems.


Made By:
Chanya Sriuranpong - Character Designer - www.chaatenn.com
Meijun Fu - Visual Designer - https://mjzoo.itch.io/songs-of-the-miao
Nitesh Sridhar - Level Designer and Programmer - niteshsridhar.com
Yue Wang - Director and Engineer - https://www.yuewangld.com/
